token_method.description:
Type of token getter.
env = get the env variable from "token"
file = read the first line of the file from "token" the path is already in config/
argument = read the value for the argument "-token"

prefix.description: bot prefix to use plugins commands via messages. if not set then OnCommand hooks won't be called.

developer_guild.description: The ID of your main server for sync app_commands fast hen using the -dev argument

owner.description: The owner ID. This user will have total authority over the bot commands
